testsuite.name: MatrixTest
testsuite.system-out:
--Test of set random elem into matrix-- 1 3 7 8 1 5 2 2 1 ----- 9 7 5 6 ----- 1 3 7 8 0 5 2 2 1 ----- 19 7 5 6 Matrix@f801f Matrix@f0a2d java.lang.RuntimeException: Row and colum index must be in bound of matrix
--Test of support-- Matrix@f8000 Immutable@ff820 --Test of dimension-- Columns : 3 Rows : 3
--Test of empty matrix--
--Test of equals-- 5 3 2 1 6 9 4 1 4 ----- 5 3 2 1 6 9 4 1 4 Is equal: true ----- 6 1 6 8 4 9 6 3 5 Is equal: false
--Test of taking Colum of matrix-- 9 4 5 8 9 7 0 9 1 Colum 0: 9 8 0 Colum -1: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Colum index is incorrect
--Test of taking elem of matrix-- 5 7 2 5 4 6 4 9 0 ----- 3 5 9 6 Matrix@f809b Matrix@f083d Elem[0;0]: 5 Elem[1;1]: 6 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 4: Row and colum index must be in bound of matrix
--Test of copy matrix-- 4 1 5 2 9 2 1 8 1 ----- 4 1 5 2 9 2 1 8 1 Matrix@f807c Matrix@f807c
--Test of transpose-- 0 2 1 8 1 2 8 3 2 ----- 0 8 8 2 1 3 1 2 2 Matrix@f8000 Matrix@f8000
--Test of self-made matrix-- Matrix@f8000 java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException: Row or colum value cannot be less then 0 java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException: Row or colum value cannot be less then 0
--Test of taking Row of matrix-- 2 3 1 5 9 8 8 6 1 Row 0: 2 3 1 Row -1: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1: Row index is incorrect
--Test of fill random elem into matrix-- 7 8 3 7 5 6 0 5 8 ----- 7 5 9 6 Matrix@f80d9 Matrix@f08b9
--Test of hashCode-- 1 7 9 8 8 1 4 7 2 HashCode: 1015839 ----- 1 7 9 8 8 1 4 7 2 HashCode: 1015839 ----- 2 4 1 2 4 7 4 4 2 HashCode: 1015870 ----- 8 2 4 4 5 4 3 1 0 HashCode: 1016056
--Test of single matrix-- 1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 java.lang.RuntimeException: Matrix should be square
